data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: People have different opinions about advanced technologies. Some would argue that there are more advantages of advanced technology, while some people think in the opposite way. Advanced technology can bring us convenience in our daily life. For example, information technology connects everyone in the world no matter where they are. However, there are also some disadvantages. These include damage to the natural environment. For instance, humans have cut down too many trees to produce all kinds of products. This causes irreversible damage to the earth. Therefore, it is important to know that advanced technology does not only bring benefits but also issues.
data.referenceText: What are the advantages and disadvantages of advanced technology?
data.referenceTranslate: 先进技术的优点和缺点是什么?
